body_html:
@samjabrahams Maybe I wasn't clear earlier, in this change I just wanted to templatize the RGBToHSV and HSVToRGB ops and retain the functionality that they already provide, that is work for type float; thus not changing any tests. In the follow up changes (new PR), I wanted to do what you did, add new types and make changes to the corresponding tests.

I don't mind making all those changes in this PR itself, but I prefer keeping PRs short (easy for both the reviewer and the author). If @rmlarsen wants me to make the changes in this PR itself, I will do it.

body:
@samjabrahams Maybe I wasn't clear earlier, in this change I just wanted to templatize the `RGBToHSV` and `HSVToRGB` ops and retain the functionality that they already provide, that is work for type `float`; thus not changing any tests. In the follow up changes (new PR), I wanted to do what you did, add new types and make changes to the corresponding tests.

I don't mind making all those changes in this PR itself, but I prefer keeping PRs short (easy for both the reviewer and the author). If @rmlarsen wants me to make the changes in this PR itself, I will do it.
